aria2
=====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which aria2 installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using aria2, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load aria2/1.35.0-GCCcore-10.3.0
```
